name: Into the Jumpspace
description:
The completed 2D Platformer for CAS 117

Modifications made:

- 3 longer, more complex levels

- A new bouncy block, with custom-made sprites and a new sound

Credits:

Tutorials by Brian Winn and Declan McClellan

Modifications made by Nova Tolmoff

Bouncy Block sprite made in Aseprite

Bouncy Block sound from Zapsplat.com
